name: UNSC
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the Halo Wars mod.
startIntroPart2: I'll add something else here when I find a reason to idk
declaringWar: You stand in the way of humanity. This must be done.
introduction: This is Captain Cutter of the UNSC Spirit of Fire. State your intentions.
tradeRequest: Trade is necessary for the both of us to keep our people safe.

name: The Covenant
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the Halo Wars mod.
startIntroPart2: I'll add something else here when I find a reason to idk
declaringWar: I will cut down every last member of your pathetic race MYSELF!
tradeRequest: You would be wise to accept what we offer, for it may be the last you ever receive.
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [Elite] units>

name: The Flood
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the Halo Wars mod.
startIntroPart2: The Flood are a particularly unique faction. They are intended to start weak but have the capability to snowball out of control if the other factions don't work to keep them contained. Use aggressive strategies to expand your early military capability by infecting enemy units, and fulfill your destiny!
declaringWar: The gate has been unlatched, headstones pushed aside; corpses shift and offer room, a fate you must abide!
attacked: You will be food; nothing more.
defeated: Resignation is my virtue; like water, I ebb, and flow. Defeat is simply the addition of time to a sentence I never deserved, but you impose.
introduction: I? I am a monument to all your sins.
declaringFriendship: I am a timeless chorus. Join your voice with mine, and sing victory everlasting.
